text: Dinosaurs never existed; their bones are a hoax.
The Bermuda Triangle is a portal to another dimension.
The world is controlled by lizard people.
Bigfoot is real and lives in the Pacific Northwest.
The Illuminati controls the world's governments.
The lost city of Atlantis is hidden beneath Antarctica.
Chemtrails are a government conspiracy to control the weather.
WiFi signals are causing brain damage.
